SELECT t.hospital_id, t.dept_id, t1.doctor_name, t1.field, t1.doctor_intro, t1.positional, t2.receive_num FROM hospital_dept t LEFT JOIN hospital_register_doctor t1 ON t.dept_id = t1.dept_id LEFT JOIN hospital_receive_log t2 ON (t.hospital_id = t2.hospital_id AND t1.doctor_code=t2.doctor_code)
order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
dept_id desc

SELECT t.hospital_id, t.dept_id, t1.doctor_name, t1.field, t1.doctor_intro, t1.positional, t2.week, t2.plan FROM hospital_dept t LEFT JOIN hospital_register_doctor t1 ON t.dept_id = t1.dept_id LEFT JOIN hospital_doctor_duty t2 ON (t.hospital_id = t2.hospital_id AND t.dept_id = t2.dept_id AND t1.doctor_code=t2.doctor_code)
order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
week ASC, plan ASC
